alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler County through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Pierson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
